article_title: Teen killed in Lumberton hit-and-run crash :: WRAL.com
article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/15332761

— A 17-year-old died Saturday night after being hit by a car while walking east on Wire Grass Road in Lumberton, authorities said.

Austin Stevey-Ray Collins was walking with the flow of traffic when he was hit from behind at about 7:15 p.m. According to authorities, the suspect, who was driving a light-colored SUV or van, left the scene.

Collins was pronounced dead at the scene.

Anyone with information is asked to call the North Carolina State Highway Patrol at 910-618-5555.

Authorities believe the suspect's vehicle suffered extensive front-end damage.
